title: About
text: My research focuses on local government responses to the climate crisis as it pertains to climate planning, land use reform, low carbon transport, and the promotion of renewable energy.

title: Handbook of the Sharing Economy Chapter
text: I was recently part of an interdisciplinary project looking at the sharing economy. A new book, The Handbook of the Sharing Economy was published late last year in which I have a chapter looking at municipal policies toward shared mobility.

title: New Research Article Published
text: I have a new article published in the Illinois Municipal Policy Journal that analyzes community choice aggregation referendums in Illinois. Check it out here.

title: Publication on Bike Share Usage
text: I have a new article published in the International Journal of Sustainable Transportation that looks at what motivates bike share users to substitute for other modes of transport. You can find the article here.
